'''Treasures of Bonkhanak''' is [[Kaveh]]'s Level 5 [[Constellation]].

==Trivia==
* Treasures of Bonkhanak references the {{w|Ka'ba-ye Zartosht}} (or Cube of Zoroaster), a rectangular structure situated opposite Darius II's mausoleum. Its original name is unknown, but in the Sassanian era it was known as Bon-Khanak.
